Publish.LongDescription:
# Demand Master Control
Demand Master Control gives the player full control over how the city grows by allowing them to tweak various demand-related factors, such as employment rates, residential occupancy, tax effects, and commuter behavior. Whether you want a more realistic demand simulation or prefer a more customized experience, this mod provides the flexibility you need.
## Features - **Happiness-Based Demand** – Adjust how citizen happiness influences residential, commercial, and industrial demand. - **Workplace Availability** – Fine-tune how free job slots impact demand for different zones. - **Tax & Student Effects** – Modify how taxation and student population affect demand calculations. - **Homelessness Impact** – Configure how homelessness affects residential demand. - **Unoccupied Building Requirement** – Set the threshold for unoccupied residential properties before new demand kicks in. - **Hotel & Tourism Demand** – Customize how tourism and hotel room availability impact demand. - **Industrial & Extractor Demand** – Manage how demand for industry and raw material extraction is calculated. - **Commuter Preferences** – Define the transportation preferences of citizens, commuters, and tourists. - **Education-Based Citizen Spawning** – Adjust the probability of new citizens having different education levels.
## Configuration - All options are fully adjustable via the Options panel. - All options can be reset to vanilla using one click.
## Compatibility - Works with existing saves. - May conflict with any future mods that alter core demand calculations. - No conflict with legacy infinite demand mods or "Super Fast Building And Leveling". - Automatically disables conflicting settings when "Realistic Trips" is active.
